about_the_game:
"Fishing Maniacs" Video Game Soundtrack.

01 Adreamation Games Studio Theme
02 Demode - Short Remix
03 Demode - - Extended Version
04 Breeze - World Map Theme
05 Sava River
06 Srna (Ultramarine) - Extended Version
07 Srna (Ultramarine) - Short Remix
08 Bolero - Extended Version
09 Bolero - Short Remix
10 Samba Go
11 Kopaonik Mt.
12 The Old One
13 Stanley Dance - Extended Version
14 Stanley Dance - Short Remix
15 Victory Theme

Performed by live guitars (classical & electric), live bass guitar, keyboards.

8 original songs, 4 short remixes, 3 themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, or newer
  • Processor: 1 Ghz or faster
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, or newer
  • Processor: 3 Ghz or faster
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
